//script to remove node from puppet enterprise
#!/bin/sh
NODENAME=#NodeName#
CERTNAME=$(echo "$NODENAME" | awk '{print tolower($0)}')
PUPPET_STATUS=$(puppet cert clean $CERTNAME)
echo "PUPPET_AGENT_STATUS : $PUPPET_STATUS"
PUPPET_STATUS_PURGE=$(puppet node purge $CERTNAME)
echo "PUPPET_AGENT_STATUS : $PUPPET_STATUS_PURGE"
PUPPET_STATUS_DEACTIVATE=$(puppet node deactivate $CERTNAME)
echo "PUPPET_AGENT_DEACTIVATE_STATUS : $PUPPET_STATUS_DEACTIVATE"
sn_cfg_cloud_script_template.name: UnsignCertOfPuppetAgent
